评论详情: The material is very comfortable and sleek. The hoodie itself, very insulated and capable of keeping me warm in 60 degree weather. I also like the words printed on the front, they make a real statement for my generation. I like this hoodie.
My daughter loves the look and can't wait to wear it to school. It fits great. She's loving the thickness and how comfortable it is. Keeps her pretty warm. Looks just as shown here. Nice quality!
